title: Add Search Feature E2E Tests
description:
Add end-to-end tests for the tool search feature focusing on happy path scenarios.

Changes needed:
1. Create search feature E2E test file
2. Add test utilities if needed

Files to modify:
- backend/test/e2e/search.e2e-spec.ts (new)
- backend/test/utils/test-tools.ts (if needed)

Test scenarios:
1. Search for existing tool and verify results
2. Navigate to tool details from search results
3. Verify empty search results message

Testing requirements:
- Focus on happy path only
- Use real API calls (no mocking)
- Test basic search functionality

Fulfills:
- Verification of all acceptance criteria in E2E context
